remarks: Lemma for ~ frmdup3 .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
frmdup3.m $e |- M = ( freeMnd ` I ) $.
frmdup3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
frmdup3.u $e |- U = ( varFMnd ` I ) $.
frmdup3lem $p |- ( ( ( G e. Mnd /\ I e. V /\ A : I --> B ) /\ ( F e. ( M MndHom G ) /\ ( F o. U ) = A ) ) -> F = ( x e. Word I |-> ( G gsum ( A o. x ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d F x $.
$d G x $.
$d I x $.
$d M x $.
$d U x $.
$d V x $.
